docs.text: Welcome to Tracnine Documentation Welcome to Tracnine API documentation, before you go straight into the technical aspect, here are some of the things you need to know about us and what we are all about. What is Tracnine? Tracnine is a delivery service plaform that helps business make various types of deliveries all accross nigeria. Who it for? Tracnine offers delivery service for: Business to Business ( B2B ): The B2B are businesses that has various vendors who sell on thier platform. Our API integration provides a seemless automated delivery system, allowing as much deliveries as they want with limitless opportunity to scale. Visit the API integration Documentation to consume our API's now. Busines to Customer ( B2C - with E-commerce platform) :This are business who sell items to customers using their ecommerce plaftorm. They can integrate with our delivery API to automate thier delivery system. Busines to Customer ( B2C ): This are business with sell items using their ecommerce plaftorm. they also integrate with out delivery API that automates thier delivery system. You: What does that mean? it means you can also make a delivery request, does not have to be a small business or Ecommerce. you can your packages to friends and family as well. Why Tracnine We exist to solve various forms of delivery problem, with our solutions: Deliveries can be made faster Businesses can scale Large deliveries can easily be schuduled and exectuted with no to low effort required. Business will be able to ship both home and abroad as well (Feature Coming Soon..).
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Welcome to Tracnine API documentation, before you go straight into the technical aspect, here are some of the things you need to know about us and what we are all about.

docs.title: What is Tracnine?

docs.text: Tracnine offers delivery service for: Business to Business ( B2B ): The B2B are businesses that has various vendors who sell on thier platform. Our API integration provides a seemless automated delivery system, allowing as much deliveries as they want with limitless opportunity to scale. Visit the API integration Documentation to consume our API's now. Busines to Customer ( B2C - with E-commerce platform) :This are business who sell items to customers using their ecommerce plaftorm. They can integrate with our delivery API to automate thier delivery system. Busines to Customer ( B2C ): This are business with sell items using their ecommerce plaftorm. they also integrate with out delivery API that automates thier delivery system. You: What does that mean? it means you can also make a delivery request, does not have to be a small business or Ecommerce. you can your packages to friends and family as well.
docs.title: Who it for?

docs.text: We exist to solve various forms of delivery problem, with our solutions: Deliveries can be made faster Businesses can scale Large deliveries can easily be schuduled and exectuted with no to low effort required. Business will be able to ship both home and abroad as well (Feature Coming Soon..).
docs.title: Why Tracnine

docs.text: Tranine API Integration Our Tracnine API Integration is easy to adopt to your online platform be it Web or mobile. You can find everything you need to make this process successful in this documentation. API Headers Our API is based on REST Principle. By default, all request to the HOST receives the v2 version of the REST API, accessed through a standard HTTPS request. The methods available for this API are the POST and GET request. API HOST Environment Base URL Status Description Production https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net Active Contains shipping endpoints for item tracking Info NOTE: Please refer to the swagger page for updated request. Methods : The methods available for this API are: Method Description GET Fetch resource POST Create resource PATCH Update resource DELETE Delete resource Responses Tracnine API returns all response data as a JSON object. View the Swagger API Model for a description of all the retrievable objects. Response Status Codes The following table shows the possible response status codes when making request, as defined in the RFC 2616 and RFC 6585: STATUS CODE DESCRIPTION 200 (OK) Successful- This means that the request is successful. The result of the request can be read in the body and the headers of the response. 400 Bad Request- This means that the request could not be understood by the server, which can probably be caused by malformed syntax. The message body will contain more information. 500 (Server Error) Server Failure - You should rarely or never see this error, unless the server is down, but you can send a ping request to confirm : "GET api/ping"
docs.title: Overview

docs.text: The following table shows the possible response status codes when making request, as defined in the RFC 2616 and RFC 6585: STATUS CODE DESCRIPTION 200 (OK) Successful- This means that the request is successful. The result of the request can be read in the body and the headers of the response. 400 Bad Request- This means that the request could not be understood by the server, which can probably be caused by malformed syntax. The message body will contain more information. 500 (Server Error) Server Failure - You should rarely or never see this error, unless the server is down, but you can send a ping request to confirm : "GET api/ping"
docs.title: Response Status Codes

docs.text: Before you begin To integrate our API successfully, you need an API key to authenticate your request. You can find your keys on the by following the steps on the authentication page. The pricing endpoint is the first API you will need to consume. This endpoint requires you to provide specific details of your package like the item weight and distance of delivery. once the JSON request below is sent successfully, you'll get a response that provides you with our pricing and delivery options to choose from. Request Body Make sure your have your valid authorization key required to succeffuly perfom this request. Sample endpoint: https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/pricing-calculator/calculate JSON Request { "stateId" : "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" , "itemCategoryId" : "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" , "weight" : 0 , "distance" : 0 , "deliveryDuration" : 0 } cURL curl - X POST "https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/pricing-calculator/calculate" - H "accept: */*" - H "Content-Type: application/json-patch+json" - d "{\"stateId\":\"3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6\",\"itemCategoryId\":\"3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6\",\"weight\":0,\"distance\":0,\"deliveryDuration\":0}" JSON Response { "" : "" } Request Parameters Parameter Type Description stateId string *required itemCategoryId string *required The item category identifier weight integer *required The weight of item distance integer *required The distance of item to from picup to destination deliveryDuration integer *required The evaluated duration or time it will take to get the item delivered to a customer
docs.title: Price Calculation

docs.text: Make sure your have your valid authorization key required to succeffuly perfom this request. docs.text: Parameter Type Description stateId string *required itemCategoryId string *required The item category identifier weight integer *required The weight of item distance integer *required The distance of item to from picup to destination deliveryDuration integer *required The evaluated duration or time it will take to get the item delivered to a customer
docs.title: Request Parameters

docs.text: This section provides all the endpoints and methods that can enable you get more information regarding reasons for tracking cancellation. Create Tracking Cancellation Reason Use this method to create a tracking cancellation reason. Make sure your have your valid authorization key required to succeffuly perfom this request. Sample endpoint: https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracker-cancellation-reason/Create JSON Request { "id" : "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" , "description" : "string" } cURL curl - X POST "https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracker-cancellation-reason/Create" - H "accept: */*" - H "Content-Type: application/json-patch+json" - d "{\"id\":\"3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6\",\"description\":\"string\"}" JSON Response { "data" : { "id" : "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" , "description" : "string" }, "success" : true } Request Parameters Parameter Type Description id string *required Item tracker ID description string *required Information containing reasons for canceling a tracker Update Tracking Cancellation Reason Use this method to updates an exsisting tracking cancellation reason using the item tracker id . Make sure your have your valid authorization key required to succeffuly perfom this request. Sample endpoint: https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracker-cancellation-reason/Update/{Id} JSON Request { "id" : "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" , "description" : "string" } cURL curl - X PATCH "https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracker-cancellation-reason/Update/3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" - H "accept: */*" - H "Content-Type: application/json-patch+json" - d "{\"id\":\"3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6\",\"description\":\"string\"}" JSON Response { "data" : { "id" : "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" , "description" : "string" }, "success" : true } Request Parameters Parameter Type Description id string *required Item tracker ID description string *required Information containing reasons for canceling a tracker Activate Tracking Cancellation Reason Use this method to activates an exsisting tracking cancellation reason using the item tracker id . Make sure your have your valid authorization key required to succeffuly perfom this request. Sample endpoint: https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracker-cancellation-reason/Activate/{Id} cURL curl - X PATCH "https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracker-cancellation-reason/Activate/3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" - H "accept: */*" - H "Content-Type: application/json-patch+json" - d "{\"id\":\"3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6\",\"description\":\"string\"}" JSON Response { "data" : { "id" : "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" , "description" : "string" }, "success" : true } Deactivate Tracking Cancellation Reason Use this method to deactivates an exsisting tracking cancellation reason using the item tracker id . Make sure your have your valid authorization key required to succeffuly perfom this request. Sample endpoint: https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracker-cancellation-reason/Activate/{Id} cURL curl - X PATCH "https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracker-cancellation-reason/Deactivate/3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" - H "accept: */*" - H "Content-Type: application/json-patch+json" - d "{\"id\":\"3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6\",\"description\":\"string\"}" JSON Response { "data" : { "id" : "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" , "description" : "string" }, "success" : true } Get Tracking Cancellation Reason Use this method to get a tracking cancellation reason using the item tracker id . Make sure your have your valid authorization key required to succeffuly perfom this request. Sample endpoint: https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracker-cancellation-reason/Get/{Id} cURL curl - X GET "https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracker/GetItem/3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" - H "accept: */*" JSON Response { "data" : { "id" : "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" , "description" : "string" }, "success" : true } Get All Tracking Cancellation Reasons Use this method to get all tracking cancellation reason. Make sure your have your valid authorization key required to succeffuly perfom this request. Sample endpoint: https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracker-cancellation-reason/GetAll cURL curl - X GET "https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracker-cancellation-reason/GetAll" - H "accept: */*" JSON Response { "data" : { "id" : "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" , "description" : "string" }, "success" : true } Query Parameters Parameter Type Description PageIndex integer Array Index of result page PageSize integer Size of result page Delete Tracking Cancellation Reasons Use this method to delete a tracking cancellation reason. Make sure your have your valid authorization key required to succeffuly perfom this request. Sample endpoint: https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracker-cancellation-reason/Delete/{Id} cURL curl - X DELETE "https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracker-cancellation-reason/Delete/3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" - H "accept: */*"

docs.text: This section provides you with all the endpoints and methods that can be performed for tracking items. Create a New Tracker Use this method to create a tracker for an item. Make sure your have your valid authorization key required to succeffuly perfom this request. Sample endpoint: https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracker/Create JSON Request { "trackingId" : "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" , "trackingStatus" : "string" , "location" : "string" , "longitude" : 0 , "latitude" : 0 , "estimatedArrivalTime" : "2021-11-15T11:49:24.874Z" , "note" : "string } cURL curl - X POST "https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracker/Create" - H "accept: */*" - H "Content-Type: application/json-patch+json" - d "{\"trackingId\":\"3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6\",\"trackingStatus\":\"string\",\"location\":\"string\",\"longitude\":0,\"latitude\":0,\"estimatedArrivalTime\":\"2021-11-15T11:51:38.882Z\",\"note\":\"string\"}" JSON Response { "data" : { "id" : "3e7c2fb9-dc1b-4ad9-9fa4-ce4fda2ce4d1" , "trackingId" : "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" , "entryDate" : "2021-11-15T11:59:33.8097732Z" , "trackingStatus" : "string" , "location" : "string" , "longitude" : 0 , "latitude" : 0 , "isCancelled" : false , "dateCancelled" : null , "estimatedArrivalTime" : "2021-11-15T11:51:38.882Z" , "cancellationReason" : null , "note" : "string" }, "success" : true } Request Parameters Parameter Type Description trackingId string *required Item tracking identifier trackingStatus string *required Tracking status of item location string *required Item location longitude integer *required Logitude of item location latitude integer *required Latitude of item location estimatedArrivalTime date-time *required The evaluated time for item(s) to be delivered to a customer note string Added note or information regarding item Update an Item Tracker Use this method to update an exsiting tracker using the tracker id . Make sure your have your valid authorization key required to succeffuly perfom this request. Sample endpoint: https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracker/Update/{Id} JSON Request { "trackingId" : "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" , "trackingStatus" : "string" , "location" : "string" , "longitude" : 0 , "latitude" : 0 , "estimatedArrivalTime" : "2021-11-15T11:49:24.874Z" , "note" : "string } cURL curl - X PATCH "https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracker/Update/{Id}" - H "accept: */*" - H "Content-Type: application/json-patch+json" - d "{\"trackingId\":\"3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6\",\"trackingStatus\":\"string\",\"location\":\"string\",\"longitude\":0,\"latitude\":0,\"estimatedArrivalTime\":\"2021-11-15T11:51:38.882Z\",\"note\":\"string\"}" JSON Response { "data" : { "id" : "3e7c2fb9-dc1b-4ad9-9fa4-ce4fda2ce4d1" , "trackingId" : "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" , "entryDate" : "2021-11-15T11:59:33.8097732Z" , "trackingStatus" : "string" , "location" : "string" , "longitude" : 0 , "latitude" : 0 , "isCancelled" : false , "dateCancelled" : null , "estimatedArrivalTime" : "2021-11-15T11:51:38.882Z" , "cancellationReason" : null , "note" : "string" }, "success" : true } Request Parameters Parameter Type Description trackingId string *required Item tracking identifier trackingStatus string *required Tracking status of item location string *required Item location longitude integer *required Logitude of item location latitude integer *required Latitude of item location estimatedArrivalTime date-time *required The evaluated time for item(s) to be delivered to a customer note string Added note or information regarding item Retrieve all Item Tracker Details Use this method to get all list items that's tied to a trackingId . You can also make a query of PageIndex and PageSize . Make sure your have your valid authorization key required to succeffuly perfom this request. Sample endpoint: https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracker/GetAll/{trackingId} cURL curl - X GET "https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracker/GetAll/3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" - H "accept: */*" JSON Response { "data" : { "pageIndex" : 1 , "pageSize" : 10 , "totalCount" : 21 , "totalPageCount" : 3 , "items" : [ { "id" : "3e7c2fb9-dc1b-4ad9-9fa4-ce4fda2ce4d1" , "trackingId" : "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" , "entryDate" : "2021-11-15T11:59:33.8097732" , "trackingStatus" : "string" , "location" : "string" , "longitude" : 0 , "latitude" : 0 , "isCancelled" : false , "dateCancelled" : null , "estimatedArrivalTime" : "2021-11-15T11:59:00.279" , "cancellationReason" : null , "note" : "string" }, ], "hasPreviousPage" : false , "hasNextPage" : true }, "success" : true } Query Parameters Parameter Type Description trackingId string *required Item trackingID path PageIndex integer Array Index of result page PageSize integer Size of result page Retrieve Item Tracking Details Use this method to get an item tracking information using the tracker id . Make sure your have your valid authorization key required to succeffuly perfom this request. Sample endpoint: https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracker/GetItem/{Id} cURL curl - X GET "https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracker/GetItem/3e7c2fb9-dc1b-4ad9-9fa4-ce4fda2ce4d1" - H "accept: */*" JSON Response { "data" : { "id" : "3e7c2fb9-dc1b-4ad9-9fa4-ce4fda2ce4d1" , "trackingId" : "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" , "entryDate" : "2021-11-15T11:59:33.8097732" , "trackingStatus" : "string" , "location" : "string" , "longitude" : 0 , "latitude" : 0 , "isCancelled" : false , "dateCancelled" : null , "estimatedArrivalTime" : "2021-11-15T11:59:00.279" , "cancellationReason" : null , "note" : "string" }, "success" : true } Delete Tracker Use this method to delete and existing using the tracker id . Make sure your have your valid authorization key required to succeffuly perfom this request. Sample endpoint: https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracker/Delete/{Id} cURL curl - X DELETE "https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracker/Delete/3e7c2fb9-dc1b-4ad9-9fa4-ce4fda2ce4d1" - H "accept: */*" JSON Response { "success" : true } Delete All Item Tracking Use this method to delete and all existing Items under a tracker using the tracking id . Make sure your have your valid authorization key required to succeffuly perfom this request. Sample endpoint: https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracker/DeleteAll/{TrackingId} cURL curl - X DELETE "https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracker/DeleteAll/3e7c2fb9-dc1b-4ad9-9fa4-ce4fda2ce4d1" - H "accept: */*" JSON Response { "success" : true } Cancel Tracker Use this method to cancel an existing tracker using the tracker id . Make sure your have your valid authorization key required to succeffuly perfom this request. Sample endpoint: https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracker/Cancel/{id} JSON Request { "reason" : "string" } cURL curl - X POST "https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracker/Cancel/3e7c2fb9-dc1b-4ad9-9fa4-ce4fda2ce4d1" - H "accept: */*" JSON Response { "success" : true }
docs.title: Tracker

docs.text: Use this method to create a tracker for an item. Make sure your have your valid authorization key required to succeffuly perfom this request. Sample endpoint: https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracker/Create JSON Request { "trackingId" : "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" , "trackingStatus" : "string" , "location" : "string" , "longitude" : 0 , "latitude" : 0 , "estimatedArrivalTime" : "2021-11-15T11:49:24.874Z" , "note" : "string } cURL curl - X POST "https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracker/Create" - H "accept: */*" - H "Content-Type: application/json-patch+json" - d "{\"trackingId\":\"3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6\",\"trackingStatus\":\"string\",\"location\":\"string\",\"longitude\":0,\"latitude\":0,\"estimatedArrivalTime\":\"2021-11-15T11:51:38.882Z\",\"note\":\"string\"}" JSON Response { "data" : { "id" : "3e7c2fb9-dc1b-4ad9-9fa4-ce4fda2ce4d1" , "trackingId" : "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" , "entryDate" : "2021-11-15T11:59:33.8097732Z" , "trackingStatus" : "string" , "location" : "string" , "longitude" : 0 , "latitude" : 0 , "isCancelled" : false , "dateCancelled" : null , "estimatedArrivalTime" : "2021-11-15T11:51:38.882Z" , "cancellationReason" : null , "note" : "string" }, "success" : true }

docs.text: Use this method to get all list items that's tied to a trackingId . You can also make a query of PageIndex and PageSize . docs.text: This section provides you with all the endpoints and methods regarding tracking status. Create a Tracking Status Use this method to create a tracking status for customers items on delivery. Make sure your have your valid authorization key required to succeffuly perfom this request. Sample endpoint: https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracking-status/Create JSON Request { "id" : "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" , "description" : "string" , "narration" : "string" } cURL curl - X POST "https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracking-status/Create" - H "accept: */*" - H "Content-Type: application/json-patch+json" - d "{\"id\":\"3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6\",\"description\":\"string\",\"narration\":\"string\"}" JSON Response { "data" : { "" : "" }, "success" : true } Request Parameters Parameter Type Description id string *required Item tracker identifier description string *required Description of tracking status narration string *required Status Narration Create a Tracking Status Use this method to updates an existing tracking status using the tracker id . Make sure your have your valid authorization key required to succeffuly perfom this request. Sample endpoint: https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracking-status/Update/{Id} JSON Request { "id" : "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" , "description" : "string" , "narration" : "string" } cURL curl - X POST "https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracking-status/Update/fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" - H "accept: */*" - H "Content-Type: application/json-patch+json" - d "{\"id\":\"3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6\",\"description\":\"string\",\"narration\":\"string\"}" JSON Response { "data" : { "" : "" }, "success" : true } Request Parameters Parameter Type Description id string *required Item tracker identifier description string *required Description of tracking status narration string *required Status Narration Activate Tracking Status Use this method to activates an exsisting tracking status using the item tracker id . Make sure your have your valid authorization key required to succeffuly perfom this request. Sample endpoint: https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracking-status/Activate/{Id} cURL curl - X PATCH "https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api//api/tracking-status/Activate/3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" - H "accept: */*" - H "Content-Type: application/json-patch+json" - d "{\"id\":\"3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6\",\"description\":\"string\"}" JSON Response { "data" : { "id" : "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" , "description" : "string" , "narration" : "string" }, "success" : true } Deactivate Tracking Status Use this method to activates an exsisting tracking status using the item tracker id . Sample endpoint: https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracking-status/Deactivate/{Id} cURL curl - X PATCH "https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api//api/tracking-status/Deactivate/3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" - H "accept: */*" - H "Content-Type: application/json-patch+json" - d "{\"id\":\"3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6\",\"description\":\"string\"}" JSON Response { "data" : { "id" : "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" , "description" : "string" , "narration" : "string" }, "success" : true } Get Tracking Status Use this method to get a tracking status using the item tracker id . Make sure your have your valid authorization key required to succeffuly perfom this request. Sample endpoint: https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracking-status/Get/{Id} cURL curl - X GET "https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracking-status/Get/3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" - H "accept: */*" JSON Response { "data" : { "id" : "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" , "description" : "string" , "narration" : "string" }, "success" : true } Get All Tracking Status Use this method to get all tracking Status. Make sure your have your valid authorization key required to succeffuly perfom this request. Sample endpoint: https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracking-status/GetAll cURL curl - X GET "https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracking-status/GetAll" - H "accept: */*" JSON Response { "data" : { "id" : "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" , "description" : "string" , "narration" : "string" }, "success" : true } Query Parameters Parameter Type Description PageIndex integer Array Index of result page PageSize integer Size of result page Delete Tracking Status Use this method to delete a tracking status. Make sure your have your valid authorization key required to succeffuly perfom this request. Sample endpoint: https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracking-status/Delete/{Id} cURL curl - X DELETE "https://api-shipping-dev-kangaroo.azurewebsites.net/api/tracking-status/Delete/3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6" - H "accept: */*"
